note: Estimates assume that current mortality rates continue and they would not have already died from any other cause of death (e.g., injuries or [HIV/AIDS](#dod:hiv_aids).)
title: Expected chances of death from non-communicable diseases, by gender
subtitle: The estimated share of 30-year-olds who would die before their 70th birthday from common non-communicable diseases: any of [cardiovascular disease](#dod:cvd), [cancer](#dod:cancer), [diabetes](#dod:diabetes), or [chronic respiratory disease](#dod:chronic_respiratory_disease).
